steps.summary: Redis cache key insights:ai_sector_risk:latest exists (EXISTS returns 1). Cache populated from Story 2.2 snapshot.

get_insight_category tool executed in 3ms with confirmed Redis cache HIT (source=redis, elapsed_ms=1.2). Backend logs show: "Cache HIT cache_key=insights:ai_sector_risk:latest" and "Snapshot cache HIT category_id=ai_sector_risk".
Response time verified: tool execution 3ms, cache fetch 1.2ms - both well under 100ms threshold. Performance requirement met.
Cache MISS detected after Redis DEL. Successfully fell back to MongoDB (source=mongodb, elapsed_ms=3.1). Tool execution completed in 6ms. Response displayed correctly in UI.
Cache repopulation verified via snapshot cron. Key exists with TTL=86385s. Design uses cache-aside pattern: writes populate cache (snapshot job), reads fallback to MongoDB without repopulating.
